briefdescription.para: Send the selection to the specified client.

detaileddescription.para: This function creates a new wl_data_offer if there is a wl_data_source currently set as the selection and sends it to the specified client, followed by the wl_data_device.selection() event. If there is no current selection the wl_data_device.selection() event will carry a NULL wl_data_offer.
If the client does not have a wl_data_device for the specified seat nothing will be done.

parameterdescription.para: The seat owning the wl_data_device used to send the events.
The client to which to send the selection.

memberdef.argsstring: (struct wl_client *client, struct wl_resource *resource, struct wl_resource *source_resource, uint32_t serial)
memberdef.name: data_device_set_selection

memberdef.name: get_data_device
